exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce prime_dec_gen to an evaluable reference.

original: unfold prime_dec_gen. intros. destruct (not_prime a H H1) as [q [b0 [Ha [Hq Hb0]]]]. apply not_prime_gen with (a:=a) (b:=b0). - apply H. - apply Hb0. - apply Ha. - apply H1. - intros c Hc. apply prime_rel_prime with (a:=a); [apply prime_intro | | apply Hc]. intros [Hc1 _]. apply Ha. destruct Hc as [Hc1 _]. apply Z.divide_opp_l. apply Hc1. apply H1. destruct (Z.divide_Zdiv_eq a q _ Hq) as [Haq _]. exists q, b0. split; [apply Haq | split; [apply Hq | apply Hb0]].
